# <a name="change-font-or-font-size"></a><span data-ttu-id="3bb05-102">變更字型或字型大小</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-102">Change font or font size</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3bb05-103">讀取時 Outlook.com 電子郵件，您可以使用您的瀏覽器縮放函式，使文字在螢幕上放大或縮小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-103">When reading email in Outlook.com, you can use your browser's zoom function to make the text on your screen larger or smaller.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="3bb05-104">若要變更的字型或字型大小撰寫郵件時：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-104">To change the font or font size while composing a message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="3bb05-105">在 [撰寫] 窗格底部，選取 [**字型**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-105">At the bottom of the compose pane, select the **Font**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="3bb05-106">或**字型的大小**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-106">or **Font size**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="3bb05-107">圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-107">icons.</span></span>
2. <span data-ttu-id="3bb05-108">選擇 [字型] 或 [您想要使用的字型大小。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-108">Choose the font or font size you want to use.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="3bb05-109">如果您沒有看到 [撰寫] 窗格底部格式設定的 [選項] 功能表，選取 [**格式設定選項**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-109">If you don't see the formatting options menu at the bottom of the compose pane, select the **Formatting options**</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="3bb05-110">圖示。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-110">icon.</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="3bb05-111">如需詳細資訊，請參閱[變更字型的大小和外觀的 Outlook.com 電子郵件](https://support.office.com/article/0b4eb323-23fc-4d5d-adbf-cae14c9c0386?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="3bb05-111">For more information, see [Change font size and appearance of email in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/0b4eb323-23fc-4d5d-adbf-cae14c9c0386?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
